text: Valerio Onida (30 March 1936 â€“ 14 May 2022) was an Italian jurist, politician and constitutional law professor. He was the Judge of the Constitutional Court of Italy from 1996 until 2005 and President of the Court from September 2004 to January 2005. Onida was born in Milan, Italy. Onida died on 14 May 2022 in Milan at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian judges Category:Italian academics Category:Italian lawyers Category:Politicians from Milan
title: Valerio Onida
